entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries over southwestern sections early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
